meanings.definition: The death or end of something.
meanings.sent1: The demise of the old tree saddened the entire village.
meanings.sent2: The demise of the toy industry led to many job losses.
meanings.sent3: The demise of the clown's career was no laughing matter.
meanings.sent4: The demise of the sun marked the end of a beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: The demise of the friendship left a void in their hearts.

meanings.definition: The transfer of property or title to another.
meanings.sent1: The demise of the house to the new owner was smooth.
meanings.sent2: The demise of the company's assets was carefully documented.
meanings.sent3: The demise of the crown to the prince was a grand ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The demise of power from the king to the queen was seamless.
meanings.sent5: The demise of the land to the farmer brought new opportunities.
